\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 5452}

\subsection*{Various Uses}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Anonymous}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 70.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}

I have used valium for various things.  5mg is ideal for an edgy trip, 10mg pretty much solves the worst trip.  1mg/hour of plane travel seems to be pretty sweet, and 5mg helped me a lot recently when I work up with a really stiff neck.  I weigh 70kg.
